use of.from sentence:
Experiment 1 : Preprocessing effect
Nevertheless , the use of more complex preprocessing techniques such as lemmatization and multiword grouping does not help in general .

observe.from sentence:
Experiment 2 : Cross-preprocessing
In this experiment we observe a different trend , with multiwordenhanced vectors exhibiting a better performance both on the single CNN model ( best over all performance in seven of the nine datasets ) and on the CNN + LSTM model ( best performance in four datasets and in the same ballpark as the best results in four of the remaining five datasets ) .

multiword - wise embeddings.from sentence: Interestingly , using multiword - wise embeddings on the vanilla setting leads to consistently better results than using them on the same multiwordgrouped preprocessed dataset in eight of the nine datasets .

use of.from sentence: Apart from this somewhat surprising finding , the use of the embeddings trained on a simple tokenized corpus ( i.e. vanilla ) proved again competitive , as different preprocessing techniques such as lowercasing and lemmatizing do not seem to help .
